titleStmt.title: Votum pro Caesare, or, A plea for Caesar discovering briefly the great sinfulness of opposing the authority of the higher powers : delivered in a sermon Octob. 7, 1660 / by Edm. Barker ...
titleStmt.author: Barker, Edmund, b. 1620 or 21.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
